name: zique-fitness-nutrition
description: Zique Fitness Nutrition - AI-powered meal planning platform

scripts.build:mobile: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www/css www/icons www/js && cp *.html www/ && cp manifest.json www/ && cp sw.js www/ && cp -r css/* www/css/ && cp -r icons/* www/icons/ && cp -r js/* www/js/
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.android:build-debug: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build-release: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.android:build-apk: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
